description: System-generated primary key for the corporate entity record used for internal references and relationships.
Business identifier/code for the corporate entity or site used across the organization.
Human-readable name or description of the corporate entity or site.
Flag indicating whether this record represents a physical site/location (1) versus a corporate grouping (0).
Reference to the parent corporate entity’s primary key, defining the organizational hierarchy.
Free-text notes about the corporate entity or site.
Primary street address line for the entity or site.
Secondary address line, such as suite, building, or unit.
Additional address line if needed for long or complex addresses.
City for the site’s mailing or physical address.
State or province for the address.
Postal or ZIP code for the address.
Country for the address.
County or similar administrative district for the address.
Primary contact person for the entity or site.
Job title or role of the primary contact.
Main telephone number for the entity or primary contact.
Mobile/cell phone number for the primary contact.
Pager number for the contact, if used.
Fax number for the entity or contact.
Alternate phone number for the entity or contact.
Label describing the purpose or type of the alternate phone number.
Primary email address for standard (desktop) correspondence.
Email address used for wireless/mobile messaging (e.g., SMS gateways).
Official website URL for the entity or site.
Hostname or network address of the application server used by this entity/site.
Hostname or network address of the database server for this entity/site.
Database or schema name associated with this entity/site’s data.
Likely database provider/type used for the site connection (e.g., SQL Server vs Oracle); confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether the database is hosted remotely for this entity/site.
System timestamp of the most recent modification to this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record; confirm with SME if distinct from system last_modified.
User ID that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
User ID that most recently modified this record.
Timestamp when a user most recently modified this record.
